culturalNotice.title: Cultural Sensitivity
culturalNotice.description: This assessment adapts to different cultural contexts. All governance traditions are equally valid, and recommendations will respect your community's values and practices.

completion.title: Assessment Complete!
completion.description: Based on your responses, we'll recommend the most suitable tools and implementation approach for your context.

governanceMaturity.title: Governance Maturity
governanceMaturity.description: How developed are your current governance systems?

conflictIntensity.title: Conflict Intensity
conflictIntensity.description: What level of conflict or tension exists in your context?

resourceAvailability.title: Resource Availability
resourceAvailability.description: What resources do you have available for implementation?

culturalCoherence.title: Cultural Coherence
culturalCoherence.description: How aligned is your community around shared values and practices?

digitalAccess.title: Digital Access
digitalAccess.description: What level of digital technology access does your community have?

scale.title: Scale of Initiative
scale.description: What is the geographic or population scale of your initiative?

emerging.label: Emerging
emerging.description: Just starting to organize or reform governance systems

developing.label: Developing
developing.description: Have basic governance structures, seeking improvement

established.label: Established
established.description: Functioning governance systems, looking to enhance

moderate.label: Moderate
moderate.description: Some tension and polarization, but manageable

high.label: High
high.description: Significant tensions, divisions, or ongoing disputes

crisis.label: Crisis
crisis.description: Active conflict, emergency, or breakdown of systems

minimal.label: Minimal
minimal.description: Volunteer time and community goodwill mainly

moderate.label: Moderate
moderate.description: Dedicated staff, modest budget, basic infrastructure

substantial.label: Substantial
substantial.description: Significant funding, skilled team, established systems

diverse.label: Highly Diverse
diverse.description: Many different cultural backgrounds and traditions

mixed.label: Mixed
mixed.description: Some shared values with notable differences

aligned.label: Well Aligned
aligned.description: Strong shared values and cultural practices

cohesive.label: Highly Cohesive
cohesive.description: Deep cultural unity and shared worldview

high.label: High
high.description: Reliable broadband, digital literacy, tech resources

local.label: Local
local.description: Community, neighborhood, or small town level
